<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lion Badge](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1498)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Threshold of Knowledge</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Threshold of Knowledge](/Sources.aspx?ID=109) pg. 10</row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You gain the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition as a result of a Will save

**Requirement** You're an expert in Will saves.
</row>

</column>

---

This plain wooden badge has the face of a roaring lion etched onto its surface. When you activate this talisman, reduce the value of your frightened condition by 1 (to a minimum of 0). When this talisman is used, the image of the lion fades and the item becomes a plain, non-magical wooden badge.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Lion Badge
requirement: You're an expert in Will saves.
